CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Century Therapeutics Inc is a biotechnology company developing transformative allogeneic cell therapies to create products for the treatment of both solid tumor and hematological malignancies with a plays a central role in the production of blood cells in the bone marrow. It is assembling a portfolio of allogeneic iNK and iT cell therapy product candidates across solid tumor and hematological malignancies.
